attributes.action: reclassify 100% of pure fruit juices, (those with no additives), as food and therefore exempt from all VAT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I drink pure fruit juices daily as both a health benefit and because I enjoy them. I also eat more than my "five-a-day" portions of fruit and vegetables. Many people do not eat "five-a-day", but pure fruit juices do count as part of it nutritionally. If all pure fruit juices were to be reclassified as a food they would become exempt from ALL VAT. The lower prices would encourage more people to drink them which would improve peoples' health, saving time off work and costs to the NHS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
